long_description: A small pack that carries skis diagonally so you can hike for the goods, the Marmot SideTrack 12 Snow Pack offers enough space for day's worth of gear for chairlift-access skiing. Low-profile design won't take up a ton of space on the chairlift and easily holds gloves, layers and snacks for a full day of shredding. Molded back panel offers comfort, and easily sheds snow when you place your pack on the ground. Shoulder straps and webbing waistbelt keep pack close. SideTrack 12 features an interior hydration pocket and an insulated hydration sleeve on shoulder strap, reservoir not included. External stash pocket is perfect for quick-access items; pocket is compatible with avalanche safety gear including a shovel and a probe. Internal mesh pocket features a key clip. Made of 420-denier nylon fabric for durability. Closeout.
short_description: A small pack that carries skis diagonally so you can hike for the goods, the Marmot SideTrack 12 Snow Pack offers enough space for day's worth of gear for chairlift-access skiing.
